mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.* FROM t_house_property_building_unit WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_building_unit
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_property_building_unit.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.building_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingId},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.unit_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.unitCode},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseType},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.house_type_picture LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseTypePicture},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_property_building_unit.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
